snippet: In his speech, Mr. Trump delivered blistering attacks on his rival interspersed with his own policy proposals.
abstract: Donald J Trump mounts attack on Hillary Clinton in speech, calling her unreliable and accusing her of putting her own concerns over those of American people; speech is bid to right his candidacy, which has struggled over past month.

byline.contributor: Matt Flegenheimer contributed reporting from Raleigh, N.C., and Yamiche Alcindor from New York.

lead_paragraph: In his speech, Mr. Trump delivered blistering attacks on his rival interspersed with his own policy proposals.

headline.main: Donald Trump Returns Fire, Calling Hillary Clinton a ‘World-Class Liar’
headline.print_headline: Trump Unleashes Torrent of Criticism at Clinton
